TopicTitle: KSP RP forum server CPU usage exceeded.

Articles.Content:
Wait, has the RP actually started and stuff? Or is everyone just settling in..

Yup. COld was, nukes, colonies, space race, I started the KSP\'s version of the Dark Brotherhood etc.
Sadly, I cannot post my response to Radion\'s video, since that would be RP\'ing and get me banned (banhammers cause pain.)
I\'m still not sure if I\'m accepted or not.

I\'m still not sure if I\'m accepted or not.

Which one did you apply for?

The Tamara colony will have been completed, and the Solara colony will be having its colonists sent by the time the site restores.

Also, Goddard Engineering will have completed research into canards and will have finalised the design for the Spiral 270-AA.
Not role-playing here, but looking at the Eceron rocket, you\'ve got quite the un-aerodynamic rocket with quite a lot of wasted stuff. The upper stage wasn\'t even used.

Not role-playing here, but looking at the Eceron rocket, you\'ve got quite the un-aerodynamic rocket with quite a lot of wasted stuff. The upper stage wasn\'t even used.

Yeah, the upper stage was accidentally decoupled from the satellite before it was supposed to because I couldn\'t tell if I had decoupled yet or if the engines were online and such. Luckily, the probe was already in orbit. It should be fine for heavier payloads.
May I also suggest nose cones for the parallel first stages?
While we\'re waiting, would anyone be interested in doing some writing for Verdad? There\'s certainly now a lot to write about.

While we\'re waiting, would anyone be interested in doing some writing for Verdad? There\'s certainly now a lot to write about.

Verdad?

Verdad?

His newspaper.
new thread?
Great, more newspapers for The Kregorian (Mine! Haha!) to print. On the bright side, MOAR war stories! (And the Verdad is funny to read, mostly for the obvious bias)
Jake Olinare (I) needs to get his story for the Kerbune about the Dolphins ready.

Wait, so this delay is actually letting us catch up on work we should have done instead of bickering at each other?

Nice 8)

Wait, so this delay is actually letting us catch up on work we should have done instead of bickering at each other?

Nice 8)

Thing is, I don\'t know what the heck I\'m supposed to mention. All I know is I gotta write an article about a band named 'The Dolphins'. That\'s all I know about it, I didn\'t memorize the facts that were provided on the forum. It\'s more like getting ready to run a sprint rather than studying before a test.

Thing is, I don\'t know what the heck I\'m supposed to mention. All I know is I gotta write an article about a band named 'The Dolphins'. That\'s all I know about it, I didn\'t memorize the facts that were provided on the forum. It\'s more like getting ready to run a sprint rather than studying before a test.

Oh dear, Rock and Roll era.

Well, time to create classical music.
It\'s not classical if you\'ve just created it, is it?

It\'s not classical if you\'ve just created it, is it?

1. I failed at making that sound sarcastic.

2. That\'s the joke.
Well, I\'m leaving to go to the grocery store, hopefully the attack will have let up by the time I\'m back.

Well, I\'m leaving to go to the grocery store, hopefully the DDOS attack will have let up by the time I\'m back.

Should have added the DDOS part in there, since when you say 'attack' to a group of RP\'ers, hilarity ensures.
Am I the only one having problems connecting to the site?

Alright, site still ain\'t up, and my computer was recovered from a major boot error. Currently I have lost all work related to the Hermes program, and it will take me a couple of hours to fix. I need to fix the upper stage for orbital ascent. So after a couple of hours, should be ready.

Alright, site still ain\'t up, and my computer was recovered from a major boot error. Currently I have lost all work related to the Hermes program, and it will take me a couple of hours to fix. I need to fix the upper stage for orbital ascent. So after a couple of hours, should be ready.

The in-character explanation will probably involve sabotage or something like that.
For the 1TB hard drive on my laptop, I lost of the 750GB stored, 325GB\'s.
